rows.label: tlk70000131_03_msg0001
rows.name:
I saw smoke coming from the
capital, and big black shadows
were flying around...

rows.label: tlk70000131_03_msg0002
rows.name:
It was really scary.
Is everything OK now?

rows.label: tlk70000131_03_msg0003
rows.name:
It's gotta be OK, or else you
wouldn't be here. Right?

rows.label: tlk70000131_03_msg0004
rows.name:
I'm scared that Hyber Village
is gonna be attacked, too.
